name: Mindful
description:
Step into a world between dream and reality where your imagination is the key to everything!

In the 2D Platformer “Mindful” you accompany the little girl Maya Mindful on her journey through a beautiful and magical world. 

Due to mysterious occurrences all imagination got banished from this word, leaving it still and lifeless. Only within the reach of Maya’s imagination time can flow as normal, awakening the world to life. Expand the reach of her imagination and transfer it to other objects, so they can stay alive and active, even when you move on. Use the contradiction of imagination and time to find your way through this world and relieve it from its ban.
